entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who became concerned about Voldemort realizing Harry's connection to him. He is also described as looking sad and tired.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person that Dumbledore is concerned about Harry being connected to.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation and is described as having witnessed an attack on Mr. Weasley.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is concerned about Voldemort realizing Harry's connection to him.
Harry has a connection to Voldemort that Dumbledore is worried about.
